:mod:`teeport.exceptions`
=========================

.. py:module:: teeport.exceptions


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:exception:: TaskStopped

   Bases: :class:`Exception`

   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

   Bases: :class:`Exception`

   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.

   Bases: :class:`Exception`

   Common base class for all non-exit exceptions.
